titleStmt.title: The Spanish tragedie containing the lamentable end of Don Horatio, and Bel-imperia: with the pittifull death of olde Hieronimo.
titleStmt.author: Kyd, Thomas, 1558-1594.

editionStmt.edition: Newly corrected amended of such grosse faults as passed in the first impression.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Allde, for Edward White,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
